item.description:
Thursday night Jazz duo with Grammy nominated Joe Parillo at Temple Downtown Restaurant located in the Renaissance Providence Downtown Hotel, Providence. Admission is free. For more information relating to the jazz night, please contact Temple Restaurant at 401.919.5050.

The last time I was here for the Thursday Night Jazz, they had put out free shrimp and mussels appetizers. Let's see if we could be just as lucky again ;-) Ask the hostess where we're seated, or call me on my cell. I will email it to all yes and maybe rsvps the day before the event.

Check out their menu at http://www.temple-dow...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess or call me
item.name: Jazz Night @ Temple
